Summary: Flying due north from the south.
divs: Sighting DetailsI thought it was an aircraft at first with flashing navigation lights but upon further examination it appeared as though it firing some sort of thrusters. There was absolutely no noise coming from it. It was flying, I'd say, at 3-4000 AGL at aprox. 2-300mph. It continued a northern tragectory until it left our line of sight. I was standing on our back deck at the time. It faces the south.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Decatur
There were no other sightings in Decatur on or around June 21st 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
